sac.stats

Class StatsXYChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • sac.stats.StatsXYChart

  • public class StatsXYChart
extends java.lang.Object
    XY chart related to statistics object (charts are generated by jfreechart software, http://www.jfree.org/jfreechart/).
    Author:
    Przemysław Klęsk (wi.zut.edu.pl), Marcin Korzeń (wi.zut.edu.pl)

      Constructor and Description
      StatsXYChart(Stats stats, java.lang.String plotLabel, java.lang.String xAxisLabel, java.lang.String yAxisLabel)
      Creates a new instance of StatsXYChart.

      Calculates and adds a labeled series of XY values to this chart, and returns the reference to it.
      void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath)
      Saves this XY chart as a JPEG file of default width and height and under given location.

      • StatsXYChart

        public StatsXYChart(Stats stats,
                    java.lang.String plotLabel,
                    java.lang.String xAxisLabel,
                    java.lang.String yAxisLabel)
        Creates a new instance of StatsXYChart.
        Parameters:
        stats - reference to statistics object
        plotLabel - wanted plot label
        xAxisLabel - wanted x axis label
        yAxisLabel - wanted y axis label

    • Method Detail

      • addSeries

        public StatsXYChart addSeries(java.lang.String label,
                              StatsOperationType operationType,
                              java.lang.String category,
                              int indexPositionAsXVariable,
                              java.lang.Object... multiIndexPattern)
        Calculates and adds a labeled series of XY values to this chart, and returns the reference to it.
        Parameters:
        label - imposed label
        operationType - type of operation
        category - category as string
        indexPositionAsXVariable - position in multi index working as x (independent) variable
        multiIndexPattern - multi index pattern (may contain nulls)
        Returns:
        reference to XY chart with a new series added to it

      • saveAsJPEG

        public void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath,
                       int width,
                       int height)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this XY chart as a JPEG file of wanted width and height, and under given location.
        Parameters:
        filePath - wanted location
        width - chart width
        height - chart height
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when something related to file operations goes wrong

      • saveAsJPEG

        public void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this XY chart as a JPEG file of default width and height and under given location.
        Parameters:
        filePath - wanted location
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when something related to file operations goes wrong
